CustomField.formula: IF( Market_Project__r.Profession__c = "RE", "Real Estate Agent", null)& IF( Market_Project__r.Profession__c = "HA", "Home/Auto Insurance Professional", null)& IF( Market_Project__r.Profession__c = "WM", "Wealth Manager", null)& IF( Market_Project__r.Profession__c = "MP", "Mortgage Professional", null)& IF( Market_Project__r.Profession__c = "CPA", "Certified Public Accountant", null)& IF( Market_Project__r.Profession__c = "EPA", "Estate Planning Attorney", null)& IF( Market_Project__r.Profession__c = "DEN", "Dentist", null)& IF( Market_Project__r.Profession__c = "PT/OT", "Physical Therapist/Occupational Therapist", null)& IF( Market_Project__r.Profession__c = "CHI", "Chiropractor", null)& IF( Market_Project__r.Profession__c = "FS", "Financial Services Professional", null)& IF( Market_Project__r.Profession__c = "IP", "Investment Professional", null)
CustomField.label: Email Templates: Profession
